duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform services not provided by a subcontractor and ensure installations are completed per Pella Manufacturing Installation Instructions.
Assess the quality of sub-contracted installations and give feedback to management.
Communicate effectively with customers and serve as a reputable Pella representative on all jobsites.
Responsible for the timely execution of the order verification process and setting realistic expectations with homeowners.
Perform job site inspection to assess home for water intrusion, rot, mold, and other issues.
Provide training as needed to Retail Sales Consultants.
Meet company safety requirements and maintain assigned vehicle and tools appropriately.
Assist with initial sub-contractor sourcing and assimilation, and with the recovery plan for installation projects.
Provide installation recovery work as needed and deliver missing items needed for installations to job sites.
Perform any other necessary task assigned by the supervisor or company in support of company goals or assistance with customer issues.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license and compliance with company Fleet Safety Policy
